Go on a culinary journey of discovery and save money!
Enjoy your meal and save money with the Barcelona Card Restaurant Restaurant.
Save money with the Barcelona Card Restaurant
10% discount in restaurants for only€5.90 - for a full calendar year There’s a discount on everything you eat and drink. And you can use the card for a whole calendar year. It becomes worthwhile very quickly.
Large selection of restaurants and bars throughout the city More than 100 restaurants offer discounts from gourmet temples, tapas bars, modern and classic restaurants, restaurants with exotic cuisine and fast food restaurants. There is bound to be a suitable restaurant near you.
No shipping costs and waiting time You do not pay shipping when we send you the Barcelona Restaurant Card by e-mail - directly after booking. Simply submit, print, save and enjoy. Upon request, we will send you the card by mail.€4.90 per booking will be charged for the delivery of the practical credit card sized card.
Book your Barcelona Restaurant Card here for only€5.90 and receive a 10% discount on everything you eat and drink at all participating restaurants. Enjoy and save! The card is valid for an entire calendar year.
Accompanying information in the following languages:
English French Italian Spanish Catalan German
Barcelona Restaurant Card Price and Shipping
Unit price of the Barcelona Restaurant Card: only€5.90 (valid for the whole year of 2012) Shipping by e-mail: free (completed immediately after booking) Shipping by post: €4.90 per booking (the Card is available in a handy credit card size)
All prices include Value Added Tax (VAT).
Booking
Booking the Barcelona Restaurant Card is easy: Enter of the desired number of Barcelona Restaurant Cards; choose the shipping method (post or e-mail). To book, click "Add to Cart" button. This takes you to our shop page.
Please note that any person who wants to avail of the discount must have their own Barcelona Restaurant Card.
Booking and Terms of Use
The following fine print is necessary:
The discount only applies to what has been consumed by the cardholder. If more people want to avail of the discount, they must also have a card. The vouchers are issued under a specific name. Please enter the name of the owner on the back of the card. Please show your Barcelona Restaurant Card prior to ordering the service. Cancellation Policy: Barcelona Restaurant Cards sent by e-mail cannot be cancelled, and it is not possible to change the name on the card Barcelona Restaurant Cards sent by post and unused cards can be refunded within 14 days after return of the card (date of postmark) and you will be refunded the purchase price. Comprehensive booking and usage terms and conditions apply. Book the Barcelona Restaurant Card here Please specify quantity: Barcelona Restaurant Card 2012 €5.90/piece Please select shipping option: E-mail* (free shipping) By post* (€4.90 shipping costs per booking) * Shipping information:
E-mail: The delivery takes place immediately after the booking. You must specify the names to be printed on the cards. You can print out the cards and then show the print-outs in the restaurant.
By post: Please take into account the transport time. Shipping to European Union countries and Switzerland. You will be sent the Barcelona Restaurant Card in credit card format.
